channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiIsolator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiIsolator

item.title: CVE-2021-41020|2024-08-04T02:59:30.981Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiisolator
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability [CWE-284] in FortiIsolator versions 2.3.2 and below may allow an authenticated, non privileged attacker to regenerate the CA certificate via the regeneration URL.
